elements.text:
GETTING OUT OF BED, A CAR, OR A DEEP CHAIR 

Over the past week, have you usually had trouble getting out of a bed, a car seat, or a deep chair?

buttons: 1:: Slight: I am slow or awkward, but I can usually do it on my first try.
2:: Mild: I need more than one try to get up or need occasional help.
3:: Moderate: I sometimes need help to get up, but most times I can still do it on my own.
4:: Severe: I need help most or all of the time.
